DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study 1 ) determine feasibility use Cardiox Liver Function Assessment System ( LFA ) measure indocyanine green ( ICG ) clearance ; 2 ) determine adequate dose base LFA technology 3 ) determine adequate time period LFA determination .
DOC.brief_title: Liver Function Assessment - Feasibility Dosing Study
DOC.detailed_description: Four cohort subject enrol . The fist two cohort receive fix dos ICG dye ( 2.5 mg , 5.0 mg , 7.5 mg , 10.0 mg ) follow 20 minute LFT monitoring . The final two cohort receive weight base dos ICG dye ( 0.1 mg/kg , 0.5 mg/kg ) follow 20 minute LFT monitoring . Additionally final two cohort serial blood draw ICG dose 5 , 10 , 15 20 minute post ICG dose .
DOC.criteria: Male female subject , age 18 75 year , inclusive Informed consent documentation understood sign . Known allergy sensitivity ICG iodide contrast dye Pregnant woman nurse baby
